examples.sentence: 新法律会使家庭经济宽裕一些
examples.englishTranslation: Families will be better off financially under the new law

definition: let the cat out of the bag

examples.sentence: 我们打算在愚人节那天捉弄他一番，但山姆露馅了
examples.englishTranslation: We planned to play a trick on him on April Fool's Day, but Sam gave the game away

examples.sentence: 这是一个值得努力把握的契机
examples.englishTranslation: This is an opportunity that bodes hard work to grasp

examples.sentence: 有一两家公司顶住了经济滑坡的势头
examples.englishTranslation: One or two companies have managed to buck the trend of the recession

examples.englishTranslation: No one believed the soldiers stationed at the border would actually open fire

examples.sentence: 他郑重其事地感谢了她

definition: remain happily married to a ripe old age

examples.sentence: 婚礼上，新娘和新郎表示要互敬互爱，白头偕老
examples.englishTranslation: At the wedding party, the bride and the bridegroom expressed that they would live in harmony and mutual respect and grow old together

definition: be all the rage at the moment; flourished

examples.englishTranslation: This academy had its heyday in the Southern Song Dynasty

examples.sentence: 在书店稀缺时，书友会盛极一时，会员数不胜数
examples.englishTranslation: Book clubs thrived when book stores were scarce, and they once enjoyed huge memberships

examples.englishTranslation: Nowadays, there are too many people competing for too few jobs
